Description: AWS CloudFormation template that describes all the required resources for setting up clevertap's stack. Supported zones are listed in the Mappings section. Certificates and base AMI id are prerequisites

VCPNetworkPrefix.Description: Just the first two octets - .0.0/16 will be appended automatically

RemoteWhitelistIp.Description: IP address to whitelist. Will be able to access services exposed on instances mapped with an elastic public IP. Must be in CIDR format

WizRocketDotNetPublicHostedZoneId.Description: Public hosted zone ID of wizrocket.net

VCPNetworkPrefix.default: VPC network prefix for this stack

SshKey.default: Default SSH key to associate with instances

Properties.GroupDescription: log collector v2 load balancer security group
api log collector load balancer security group
sensu api load balancer security group
sensu api load balancer security group
